channel.title: Data visualization on Thoughts & experiments
channel.description: Recent content in Data visualization on Thoughts & experiments

item.title: Exploring search trends with gtrendsR
item.description: Using gtrendsR package Let’s explore some basic trends on usage of popular tech products in India. We’ll do a quick exploration of search trends on web. We will try to be careful that there is some logic to higher usage leading to more web searches. Still, don’t take it as a rigorous way to analyse, but only as a fun way to explore the functionality of an R package.
